Instruction: In a large bowl,  toss the cauliflower florets with olive oil,  garlic powder,  grated Parmesan cheese,  salt, and black pepper until evenly coated.
Spread the cauliflower in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes,  or until the cauliflower is tender and golden brown,  stirring halfway through cooking.
Remove from the oven and garnish with chopped fresh parsley before serving.
Enjoy hot as a delicious side dish.
